sent.orig: Go downstairs through Exit B; turn around and take the escalator downstairs.
sent.trans: 从B出口下地下，后转然后乘向下的扶梯。

sent.orig: The man downstairs to the man downstairs.
sent.trans: 楼下的那个人决定和楼上的那个人谈谈。

sent.orig: They went to the shop downstairs. They bought some ice cream. Patsy divided the ice cream.
sent.trans: 他们去楼下商店买了些冰激凌。帕特西来分配这些冰激凌。

sent.orig: Closed the computer, and hurtle to come downstairs.
